line_1: Both pleas'd with all we thought We wanted:
line_2: Which Thy own Hand had whilom planted,

line_1: Only to shew how many Tastes he wanted.
line_2: For what has Virro painted, built, and planted?

line_1: All the empire I had wanted
Us'd here — because the rhyme I wanted:
line_2: The first and last from Greece transplanted,
An' her ain fit, it brunt it;

line_1: Or gave, where vices might he wanted,
line_2: The name, and took the rest for granted.
